allow:
Bash(#!/bin/bash
# Search for usage of types
echo "=== SEARCHING FOR TYPE USAGE ==="

# Function to search for a type
search_type() {
    local type_name="$1"
    echo ""
    echo "Searching for: $type_name"
    # Search for the type usage (excluding its definition)
    rg -c "\b$type_name\b" --type swift ./Sources ./Tests ./Examples 2>/dev/null | grep -v ":0$" | sort
}

# Core types that are likely used
search_type "FoundryGenerationError"
search_type "FoundryGenerationOptions"
search_type "FoundryModel"
search_type "FoundryModelSession"
search_type "FoundryBackend"
search_type "BackendResponse")

Bash(#!/bin/bash

search_type() {

    echo ""
    echo "Searching for: $type_name"
    rg -c "\b$type_name\b" --type swift ./Sources ./Tests ./Examples 2>/dev/null | grep -v ":0$" | sort
}

# Types from StructuredGeneration.swift
search_type "StructuredOutput"
search_type "StructuredGenerationConfig"
search_type "FunctionSpec"
search_type "FunctionCall"
search_type "JSONExtractor"
search_type "StructuredPromptBuilder"
search_type "SchemaExtractor")

search_type "SchemaType"
